availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard Richards (Kenton County, Kentucky, rolling mill boiler)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, rolling mill boiler. Native of Wales. Married to Elizabeth Richards. Father of Lewis Richards, Margaret Richards, and John Richards. Boiler at a rolling mill in Kenton County in 1860. Boiler in Kenton County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 1, p. 546.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 6th Congressional District, Vol. 3, June and July 1863, p. 193, p. 387 of microfilm, (Accessed via ancestry.com on March 25, 2020).
